reviews.review: This game is probably one of my favorite games out there. Nice and thought provoking puzzles and a story that no other game can beat 10/10. (Waiting for Portal 3 Valve...)

Игра хоть и старая, но всё равно очень интересно в неё играть. Интересные головоломки, особенно приходиться попотеть в усложнённых камерах с временем, кол-вом шагов и кол-вом порталов. В общем классная игра

Игра отличная(но короткая), Хотя она не такая уж и короткая(сюжетка - да), но не сама игра, эти бл#т достижения..Игра начинаеться когда ты решил выполнить её на 100%, вот тогда начинается мясо, боль, сломанная клавиатура и мышь(лично я сломал клаву и мышь, в головоломках, камера 15(мин. шагов), камера 17(мин. порталов) и камера 16(мин. время), вообщем всем советую, шел 2020-тый год..=)

Portal is just beautiful. Definitely a must-have. If you like puzzle and physics games you are gonna love it.

Playing this game tests your puzzle skills. They're very satisfying to solve. The game is quite short but there's never a dull moment. As you progress in the game you learn more and more about this machine and it's true motive. It's a game I'd recommend.

Tl;dr-  Amazing game, with a unique concept of navigating through Portals to solve puzzles, must play !
 
I bough this game randomly when it was super cheap on a steam sale and im so glad i did, because this is one of the best games iv'e ever played ! The idea of the game is to navigate through Portals completing different puzzles known as test chambers in the game. The game difficulty progresses gradually as you play and the game gives you a perfect idea of the mechanics in the starting test chambers.

The story mode is pretty short and can be completed in one sitting and is a perfect setting for the events of Portal 2. Overall a must try for anyone into puzzle solving or actually for anyone who'd like to try something new and unique.
игра с физикой которая увлекает тебя до конца)

este juego hizo que me quedara 75 horas pensando en que habia jugado el mejor juego para pc y al mejor precio teniendo en cuenta que su historia es alucinante dandonos una nueva jugabilidad, unos graficos buenos teniendo en cuenta la salida del juego. lo mejor de todo es la CANCION del final. un 10!
Easily the best puzzle game ever made.

Amazing game, can't believe it took me 13 years to get around to playing this one. An absolute gem for anyone that likes puzzle games, and gets really dark at the end in ways I was not expecting. Only thing I disliked was the tedious and unnecessary boss battle at the end. 8/10
I enjoyed the difficult puzzles and strange story line

Portal is an absolute declaration of quality. Even after all those years, this game remains a great example of bite-sized story combined with fine gameplay and clever game mechanics that some developers still thrive to achieve. It is an indisputable classic. The beauty of the story stands in its simplicity, without over complicating the plot, going straight to the bare bone experience of puzzle solving and lacking none of its core elements.

A must play across every generation.
Me he pasado ya el juego, pero obviamente lo haré otra vez. Portal es de esos juegos que de verdad disfrutas y la intriga te retiene en muchos momentos.
Really fun game! Gonna play Portal 2 now
The game is very fun, the graphics are perfect, it has really aged well and the puzzles are frustrating but solving them is very rewarding.
it is a classic get it now!
im very GlaD to have bought this game
Это знать надо, как сан андрес или халву

Ending Review and Overall Opinion:

The game begins in a small container glass cell where a timer counts 1 minute and after it runs out of time, the player is brought to the first level. 
The plot tells the story of robot, Glados, that guides the main character throughout the levels until an unexpected and surprising ending.
The game is easy and starts to complicate a little bit at the end, but not as much as you think. 
The tutorials (first levels) do their part and make the player understand the mechanics really well.
The mechanics of the game are surprisingly good and if we look at the year that the game was published, it were even more impressive back at 2007. 
The game emerged me into the desire of finishing it in one piece and it succeded.

Personal Rating: 8/10
A ver el juego esta chulo lo que pasa es que es demasiado corto pero el resto me gusta

God this game was my entire childhood for a while. I can't reccomend it enough. It's not very long if you know all the solutions, but it's still a great puzzle game and one of my favourite series of all time.
